name: A knots story
description:
Here's a sneak preview of our fresh new game "Knots story".
The demo introduce you to Mileo an apparently normal kitten.
The demo represent 2/3 of the chapter 1 then if we can have some support we will release 4 chapters to devellop the entire story and sell it at a very small price.
Every feedbacks are more than welcome! (including on telling us how terrible is our English and how to improve it :)).

Please come join us to chat and socialize ^^:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CrounchyB
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/crounchybrothers/
